website_summaries.verdict: This basic bed skirt adds a high-class look for a not-so-high price.
pros: Fits standard cribs measuring 28 inches by 52 inches and most toddler beds
Machine wash cold with like colors
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Wrinkles easily, but you can iron them out

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and functional. Only with a iahd a steamed to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER long if crib is in lowest position.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed by this skirt, and this might actually be my fault, due to lack of realization. I placed this on my 18 month old’s crib, and immediately noticed how about 3-4 inches were dragging on the ground. These would be perfect for a crib that is in the highest position, or 2nd highest, but does not work with a crib that in the lowest, even with folding back portions of the material. I am probably going to end up hemming them slightly, to make them fit, because they are nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie D.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Shabby chic look! Simple and easy to put on your crib. I’ve gotten lots of compliments on this!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly in my nursery. Good quality for the price. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: k_han

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, a little darker than pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Great skirt! I washed and dried two times and it was still extremely wrinkly so I had to iron it. A little darker than the advertisement color but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our crib with so much ease. Would recommend steaming it to get out any wrinkles from how it’s packaged but otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Versaw

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! So cute and you can’t beat the ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! So cute and you can’t beat the price! I ordered the blush pink and it was perfect for our color theme.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great price but fit a little funny.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other skirts for the price I would say this is a great buy. It was just as I was expecting it to be. The only reason I’m giving it a 4 star is because it didn’t exactly fit quite perfect with our crib and it is a standard one. I had to pull more from one side just to make it look good at the front and the corners fit funny. Not a huge deal, I still made it work. Besides that, it is a nice crib skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Adoreeee! Love the color and price (in comparison to other skirts and this color, it was like half the price if not more). Slightly wrinkled from packaging but I just put all together to get a feel for what it’d look like. Baby girls not here yet (stuffed animals will be taken out of course) but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: Good value & fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a good purchase. I bought the ivory ruffle skirt and the fitted sheet. Fit perfectly, I will wash & dry to smooth out wrinkles from packaging. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exact color I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a purple bedskirt and this one was the closest one I could find that I wanted that didn't cost and arm and a leg. I love the color. It's exactly as pictured. Did come wrinkled and I'll eventually get to de wrinkling it. It goes on all 4 sides. Kind of wished it was 3 but that's ok. I needed one to cover the drawer km the bottom of the crib. You could see everything in the drawer before. Bedskirt did the job on hiding what's in the drawer and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, but color description needs updating.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the purchase, however in no way should this shade be described as "hot pink" and IMO that's definately misleading to buyers. We have multiple shades of pink in our nursery, so the shade wasnt going to make or break our hearts either way, but if someone was looking for "true" hot pink, they would not be happy with this color - more of a soft, petal pink or rosy pink. I also took the time to look at the actual photos people had posted prior to purchasing, so I was in no way disappointed when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functions well
customer_reviews.text: I like that the corners are split. It’s not terribly soft but it’s a skirt so who cares. I wish there were ties of some sort on the underside to secure it to the mattress frame and keep it from moving when you take the mattress off to change the sheets. Not a deal breaker as I’m not sure any skirt is made this way...
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: White Soft Crib Skirt
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is very soft and well made. It did have a few wrinkles from being folded, packaged and mailed. (But that is expected.) I just ran my iron over the shirt and it was ready to go. Thank you for a great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Short than some others but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but not as long as my other dust ruffles. When the crib is at the highest level for a newborn this dust ruffle does not touch the floor so it bothers me a little. It will work great for when we lower the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy :D
customer_reviews.text: It looks absolutely beautiful! Mattress is set on "high" right now ( photo ). It is wrinkly when you take it out of the package of course, so you have to iron it to look like that. Highly recommended :D ---> I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although I DO love this product, it doesn’t really work with my daughters crib as it is too long because of a drawer underneath. I won’t knock it for that, it’s my fault. The product itself is a great value, soft, held up well so far through washes, and looks very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good skirt
customer_reviews.text: Great skirt. Washes and dries well. It’s a bit wrinkled after but I don’t care enough to have to iron it- it’s fine. Easy to put on the crib and it’s thin enough that for my Baby Letto crib it’s was very easy to fit it in between the railing and the bed. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: allison h

customer_reviews.title: Ivory is white
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Ivory - it is white. Even the package was labeled ivory. However it still worked for my space so I kept it but false advertising. Otherwise cloth and quality as expected. Photos include ivory pillow next to it to compare as well as white crib
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its a good skirt
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this skirt. It was by far cheaper than a majority of the ones I looked at. BUT it does do what it is intended to do, lay there and do nothing! It is very wrinkly even after washing so I will have to steam it. Not very soft but it fits the crib nicely and for the money I would say its a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product. As far as plain white crib skirts go, you can’t go wrong with this one. It’s not super soft by any means, however it’s a crib skirt and is not intended to be slept on etc. For the price point, it’s pretty close to perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Selby441

customer_reviews.title: I like the simplicity of this crib skirt but it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this crib skirt but it seems to be a little off from the size of my crib (GRACO) . We had to do some tucking so the white part that overlays the spring wouldn't show but its pretty good quality. It works for what we need and I cant complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tojo

customer_reviews.title: Modest ruffle and great screen for storage bins under the crib!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this bed skirt is pink, but without all the rows of ruffles that make the crib look too prissy. Both lovely and practical, since it hides the storage bins under the crib!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Crib Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for my daughter’s crib. Item was packaged well and protected which was important to me since it was white. The fabric is reasonably thick and very easy to iron. Perfect length as well. I have her crib set to the highest setting, by the way. Will be purchasing the light pink one as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: xojenn

customer_reviews.title: Simple & cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed! Just wanted to jazz the area up a bit with still keeping it safe sleep and this crib skirt did the trick! Just dewrinkled in the dryer and it was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie S

customer_reviews.title: Mimi’s nursery for grand babies
customer_reviews.text: I have a nursery for my grand babies and was changing the color from mostly pink to neutral so I went with white ... I wanted it to look elegant for both the granddaughter and the grandson as my theme is a French influence.....I am so pleased with how the nursery turned out ... this skirt was perfect for the crib 💜
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann

customer_reviews.title: This product came with a good package. The skirt is very soft and color is pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a good package. The skirt is very soft and color is pretty. However, the material became harder than the original condition after washing with the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lin

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: It’s slightly too long for my crib. It drags a little. I find that on the infant setting it’ll work but the lowest level of the crib height is too low.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib skirt!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is exactly what I wanted! I just took it out of the package and tumbled it in the dryer for about 5 min to de-wrinkle and put it on. It’s so cute and made very well. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this crib skirt. It's a great price! It does come very wrinkled, which I tried to iron out, but I couldn't seem to get it all. I still think it looks good though! I would recommend if you're looking for an affordable crib skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: True to picture
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. No complaints ! Exactly what you see is what you get ! Came fast and a few minutes in the dryer took the wrinkles right out
customer_reviews.author: Solymar

customer_reviews.title: Great price even better quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually really impressed , the quality , thickness and length is prefect I'm able to hide a few storage bins underneath my son crib and you can't see through the fabric. it blends in very well with his current bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crib.
customer_reviews.text: I put this together mostly by myself. My husband helped me a little. the only thing I don't like about it is where you lower and raise the mattress. It didn't use hooks, you actually have to use a screwdriver. That is the part I had to have my husband help me with. I think it will really be hard to change it by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: CJMAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is easy to put on with the help of someone else- if you're pregnant LOL. I got the matching crib rail covers to protect for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the crib skirt , color is true to the picture online, material is a thin material but not see through . The ruffles add a cute character to it
customer_reviews.author: Kiesha 💓

customer_reviews.title: Cute, just wish it was longer
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bed skirt but I wish it was longer especially since our current crib set up is for an infant so it is raised and therefore you can still see under the bed which is what I wanted to avoid. We will like it more as our daughter gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Came in on time. I got the pink color ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time. I got the pink color and ot was a soft pink. If you are buying the matching bumper with this be aware that the bumper is more of a hot pink while the skirt is a light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Flat_mountain_top

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: Cute skirt was easy to wash and care for. My only issue is I wish it was a bit longer, it hits about 2” above the floor but this may vary based on your crib, Ours is currently on the highest setting. Fabric and quality was great- just a wash and iron to get it looking nice for the crib!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length and fits nice over the springs. The corners are reinforced making this a durable piece to last.
customer_reviews.author: Buy Bye Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits our standard size crib exactly as puctured, ending about 1-2 inches or so from the floor. I primarily bought this so our shy cats would have a place to be at ease with all the changes going on. They feel very safe with it. It’s also super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Crump

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is awesome! They are a little thin, but looks so good once it’s on. I did have to iron when I opened but the wrinkles came out really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice cotton!
customer_reviews.text: I more often than not am disappointed in the textiles on Amazon for "cheaper" products. It's so hard to tell. But this dust ruffle is sturdy, soft, well made, well stitched and so absolutely darling. It's all I hoped for and more. I'll be able to use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple buy
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple buy. Ruffle is on all four sides of the sheet. Color is more of a taupe gray than a true gray so it will match in a room that's got both. Expect the need to iron it before putting it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib skirt. It is slightly bigger that the size of the crib but that's a good thing because I've had bed skirts shrink in the wash on me. The color is pretty and goes well in my baby girl's room. It's perfect because it allows me to hide all the boxes of clothes she's grown out of under her crib!
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. Washed well. Looks just like the picture. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Great product well made . The color is like a baby pink which was easy for me to match with other colors
customer_reviews.author: Huascaran

customer_reviews.title: So adorable.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is perfect and just what i needed. Such a great price compared to some stores charging more than double for a skirt. I love this one and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Bearr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this crib. It is absolutely beautiful in my daughters room with light pink accents. It was easy to assemble, its very sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Emily D

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cute
customer_reviews.text: Crib skirt fits perfectly and goes on easily. Aesthetically pleasing and the color is as advertised/shown. Very nice addition to our nursery decor.
customer_reviews.author: S Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing super special about this bed skirt. Good color, does the job 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Daddy, Mama, Mila, & Baby Jake

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Fit bed perfectly. Nice quality and happy with purchase:)
customer_reviews.author: Tduh89

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a standard crib
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib skirt. Has not faded and it's the perfect length. Would wish it would come with something to keep it in place. Overall a great color and material.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice long bed skirt. Good for tall cribs!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep bed skirt. Our crib is abnormally high I feel like and this only leaves maybe 6 inches exposed underneath. Matches the other greys in our nursery perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Miller

customer_reviews.title: PAINT CHIPS OFFF! DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe that something for a baby would be unsafe as a baby product! Babies who are in cribs grow teeth and bite everything. I was shocked to see the paint chipped off and the crib already ruined only having it for a few months. This is so dangerous. And a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easily adjustable for different types of cribs
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Washed it and put it on crib to dry and it looks great! Now I can store extra baby supplies under crib without seeing them :)
customer_reviews.author: Carli Townley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Comes in a nice package and fits well. Color is represented accurately. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Just didn't use.
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt a true grey. Was a very purple grey. Didnt use. But very well made and looked like picture and would have used if it was right color.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for our crib, I did not care about the quality of the fabric as it won’t be touching the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our newborns crib to hide the sides and underside.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: While this bedskirt didn't work out for me as I expected, the TILLYOU customer service was excellent. They emailed me after I received the product, to make sure I was 100% satisfied and if not see what they could do to ensure that I was. While I would not purchase this bed skirt again, I would definitely get something from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S Shanley

customer_reviews.title: Gray is very light
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great! Usually the center white piece of a bedskirt will show, but this bedskirt fits well! The gray is a light gray. It is considerately lighter than the other grays in the room, but will work for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Color is well represented in picture, works exactly as I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: BWasz

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great and does help cover the gap under the mattress. I only took one star away because I was hoping it would be a little longer than it is when the crib is at the highest setting (as shown in the picture). However for the price, I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: AliCat

customer_reviews.title: Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my Daughters nursery, it looks extremely nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful White Bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a white bed skirt for the baby's room and was so excited to find this one. It came in a plastic package. The only thing I did to make it perfect was iron it which was so easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Oseguera

customer_reviews.title: Blue crib bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: Theres nothing I dont like.I love it. Product was exactly as described. would purchase again and would do business with this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt was perfect for my nursery! It looks great! It was just what I was looking for. Great color and nice fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Ruffles came out
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and was exactly what i wanted but after one wash the ruffles came out .... so very unhappy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is great for the money. I wanted something cheap and it’s still super cute. Just needed to iron it!
customer_reviews.author: Jena Smedal

customer_reviews.title: Short Skirt
customer_reviews.text: The skirt is way shorter than what the photo displays.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice skirt, good fit, a little sheer but it's perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt fit as described and is a very nice addition to the crib itself.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Long
customer_reviews.text: I have a Graco crib with a draw underneath and I was having trouble finding a bed skirt that would hide the contents inside the draw. This one is long enough to cover the draw contents without exposing the white part of the skirt. Material is thick and was able to get wrinkles out with a 10 minute dryer trip.
customer_reviews.author: Alaysha Helms

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. It fits perfectly. I ordered the lavendar because based on the pictures it looked less purple and more pink. I was right. It's not very purpley but is still very pretty. I am pleased. The color matched the pictures on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: After a wash and an ironing it looks perfect in our baby girls room. Pink is true to color.
customer_reviews.author: BlueberryDonut

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the photo - appears to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: kerisamarie23

customer_reviews.title: Recommend product
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt was just what I needed . Simple and clean lines and goes well with my baby boy’s crib. I had a little stain that was noticed on the item when received but after notifying the seller , they were very quick to respond and resolve the issue for me which I really appreciate . Overall , I would recommend this product for any parents who just want a simple crib skirt to add a little touch to their nursery .
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is cute and well-made. Perfect for my lavender floral themed nursery.
customer_reviews.author: hmclaug

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was longer
customer_reviews.text: When the crib is at the infant level its not long enough.. My hopes were for this skirt to hide the bins i have stored under the crib. Other than that its very cute and will do the job once the crib is lowered.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - the colors may vary from order to order
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of the same colored bed skirt and they came out different colors of pink. Our little girls share a bedroom and have matching bedding so this wasn't exactly what we wanted... But the quality is good! They have held on through 1 year of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Ask

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks very stylish with my son's bedding. It fits perfectly and the Color is a true Navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: HandKraffted

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a first babies crib. At first my husband thought I ordered the wrong size until I showed him how it was suppose to go lol. Material was thinner than I expected but does the job it's intended for. Arrived within a couple days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Chase

customer_reviews.title: Looks super
customer_reviews.text: Love bright pink color. Fit well. Very wrinkled due to tight packaging, but ironed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ugly color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey color and it is actually taupe. Not grey at all! Pretty cheap quality the material and color. Oh well there goes $17 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and good material This was the perfect color for my baby’s nursery
customer_reviews.author: Jswife4life

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the bed skirt didn’t fit as it was to big.
customer_reviews.author: betzy cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Very soft, well made, packaging was nice! A little wrinkly after washing but Totally worth it and very pleased with my purchase! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and fits the crib great. Glad I got this one instead of others I viewed that were more costly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Crib Skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a nice but inexpensive skirt for my new grand-daughter's crib that is in my home -- i wanted to keep it elegant and in line with my home style and this worked perfectly! Color true to pic.
customer_reviews.author: SKCNola

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it looks on the crib. Fit just right. I would recommend for it to be ironed before you set it up The color was just right. Light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Mauriciojr3

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality crib bed skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Easy to put on. Nice color gray. It was a good buy and I would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. Overall I’m pleased. A little annoyed with how much it attracts lint but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this crib skirt. Looks just like the picture in color and look and you can tell the material is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Smith

customer_reviews.title: As opposed to the Burt's bees cribs skirts that don't wrinkle (I have the pleated navy for my son) this wasn't good quality. For the price it was alright
customer_reviews.text: This is just a basic white crib skirt, nothing fancy, the material was OK quality and aggravating to get straight and get unwrinkled. As opposed to the Burt's bees cribs skirts that don't wrinkle (I have the pleated navy for my son) this wasn't good quality. For the price it was alright.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Means

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt was way too long and drags on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved in the mail and it fits perfectly, it's not too long or too short. The white is perfect. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and good quality too
customer_reviews.text: The frills look good on my son’s crib and they are of good quality with reasonable price. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavika Dadia Sanghavi

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty flimsy and sad, but it doesn’t break the bank, either. I may purchase something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gender-Neutral Bed Skirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT value for the price. The bed skirt itself is soft and flow-y and hangs very nicely under the crib. Also pretty wrinkle-resistant... Came folded up in a small package but it didn't have any wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ann Yapp

customer_reviews.title: Nice and full skirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib skirt it is beautiful for the price I don't think it looks cheap and it's nice and full. I got the gray and it is true to the picture color.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

product_meta.title: TILLYOU Gray Crib Bed Skirt Dust Ruffle, 100% Natural Cotton, Nursery Crib Toddler Bedding Skirts for Baby Boys or Girls, 14" Drop, Gray
feature_bullets: STYLISH DESIGN: TILLYOU extra-long classic ruffled crib skirt is styled with grace ruffles for a soft tailored finished look. Add the finishing touch to your nursery or toddler bed with our crib skirt.

HIGHEST QUALITY FABRIC: The ruffles are made of 100% natural cotton while the platform is made of 100% microfiber polyester. Our crib bed skirt is breathable, soft, gentle , which also pass CPSIA test requirements and meet CPSC standards. All our concern is to bring your baby a warm and cozy nursery room to slumber and dream.

SAFE FIT: Measuring 28” x 52” with 14’’ drop, this crib skirt fits perfectly on all standard cribs and most toddler beds. The 14’’ length is long enough to discreetly hide storage under the crib. Finished with 4 split corners to make placement around crib posts easy and make changing and washing stress free.

Durable Use & Machine Washable: Machine washable on gentle cycle. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry. Experimental testing shows that TILLYOU crib skirts can withstand hundreds of washing & drying cycles and do its job!
TOP RATED CUSTOMER SERVICE: We offer 30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE and 1-YEAR QUALITY WARRANTY to make your shopping assured. Questions reaching to us will be answered under 24 hrs.
